articles.description: Filmed over the course of two years, the documentary will feature rehearsal and performance footage, plus new interviews with Marianne Elliott, Katrina Lenk, Patti LuPone, Stephen Sondheim, and members of the original 1970 cast. The working title is Great Per…
articles.content:
Great Performances will present a documentary exploring the legacy of Stephen Sondheim and George Furth's musical Company, part of the series' fifth "Broadway's Best" lineup.

articles.title: Daniel Radcliffe will play 'Weird Al' Yankovic in biopic - New York Post
articles.description: The Boy Who Lived will star as the man who sang "Eat It."
articles.content:
The boy who lived will soon be the man who sang “Eat It.”
Daniel Radcliffe, 32, is playing “the king of spoof” parody musician “Weird Al” Yankovic, 62, in a new biopic. Called Weird: The Al Yankovic… [+2273 chars]
